name: rn-dependency-radar
description: React Native & Expo Dependency Health Monitor for VS Code.

rnDependencyRadar.scanOnStartup.description: Run an initial dependency scan when opening a React Native or Expo project.

rnDependencyRadar.alertLevel.description: Minimum risk severity level to display immediate alerts.

rnDependencyRadar.ignore.description: List of dependencies to be ignored by RN Dependency Radar in this workspace.

rnDependencyRadar.riskThresholds.install.description: Thresholds (in months) for installed version age to trigger risk levels. Versions older than 'high' months get HIGH risk, older than 'medium' months get MEDIUM risk.

rnDependencyRadar.riskThresholds.missedV.description: Thresholds for number of missed versions to trigger risk levels. More than 'high' versions get HIGH risk, more than 'medium' versions get MEDIUM risk.

rnDependencyRadar.riskThresholds.library.description: Thresholds (in months) for library's last update to trigger risk levels. Libraries not updated in more than 'high' months get HIGH risk, more than 'medium' months get MEDIUM risk.
